wikipedia_page.main: Eric William Mann (4 March 1882 – 11 February 1954) was an English cricketer and philatelist who signed the Roll of Distinguished Philatelists in 1947. He was President of the Royal Philatelic Society London between 1946 and 1949. Mann was an expert on the stamps of Natal and Tasmania.

response: *Eric W. Mann (1882–1954), English first-class cricketerWisden Cricketer's Almanack, "Obituaries in 1954"
